name: SpiNNaker Software
body:
# SpiNNaker Software
This page details the software available for use with and on the SpiNNaker platform.

## PyNN on SpiNNaker
Our implementation of the PyNN neural network simulation language has the following features:
 - Implementation of the IF_curr_exp, IZK_curr_exp and IF_cond_exp models (more to follow).

Installation instructions for using PyNN on SpiNNaker are available [here](https://github.com/SpiNNakerManchester/SpiNNakerManchester.github.io/wiki/PyNN-on-SpiNNaker-Installation-Guide).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
